adDetails: I care about the quality of workmanship as much as the quality you are left with when the job is done. Customers say, "beautiful workmanship". I also provide an excellent color service, my specialty, and use low VOC paints so your house will smell like home instead of paint after I finish. Fast and reliable. Small to medium size jobs. Credit cards accepted. Paste this link into your browser >>> http://intptform.homestead.com/InteriorPaintingFormEJ.html and submit your info, or, text "PAINT" to show contact info for more info. We'll respond as soon as possible.
